metadata.title: CVE-2021-34548 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tor before 0.4.6.5, aka TROVE-2021-003. An attacker can forge RELAY_END or RELAY_RESOLVED to bypass the intended access control for ending a stream.

criterions.comment: tor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
